title: [Large-Scale] Mid-Level Leadership Development: Blended Learning-Based Practical Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic leadership concepts and work experience within organizational settings
context.additional_context: Blended education combining smartphone-based mobile learning and offline workshops for mid-level managers requiring team leadership and task execution skills

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose their role awareness and leadership styles as mid-level leaders within an organization.
Learners can design team collaboration strategies in blended learning environments and apply them to practical tasks.
Learners can establish leadership development plans through project-based assessments and analyze execution outcomes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
